rooms.description:
You find yourself in a snowy hellscape naked but a broken fitbit and a pair of flip flops 
To the north there is a cabin, to the east is a foreboding forest
Dense forest, as your mind wanders to the Forbidden Forest of Harry Potter you hear a growl up ahead. Standing terrified, you spot a phaser in the undergowth.
Abandoned one-room cabin, a rug lies in the middle of the room.
Dark, wet tunnel. Ahead to the east you see the opening to a cave, this must be the way home.

You step through the cave opening only to spot the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on! 
It's the Rabbit of Caerbannog!!!!
